attributes.action: Make police checks compulsory on all visa applicants to the UK
attributes.additional_details: The UK must be brought into line with other countries e.g. America, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, South Africa etc and insist on a police check on criminal records before issuing visas. The current system allows dangerous criminals to get visas by lying. My family nearly lost their lives as a result of this weakness. This is a zero cost procedure as the applicant pays. It would save millions in court cases, police work, prison, legal aid etc and keep us all safer.
